snippet: Testimony from the director of the security force did little to persuade questioners of either party that she has the will to right the troubled agency.
abstract: Editorial contends Secret Service has revealed itself to be bungling and dysfunctional in series of incidents, latest of which was Omar Gonzalez making his way into White House while carrying knife; urges Pres Obama to insist on independent, top-to-bottom review of the agency.
lead_paragraph: Testimony from the director of the security force did little to persuade questioners of either party that she has the will to right the troubled agency.

headline.seo: Julia Pierson's Secret Service and the White House Breach
headline.main: The Collapse of the Secret Service
headline.print_headline: The Collapse of the Secret Service
